snippet: Dr. Buchanan, a professor emeritus at George Mason University and a conservative thinker on taxes and size of government, won the 1986 Nobel in economic sciences.
abstract: James M Buchanan, conservative scholar who won the 1986 Nobel prize in economic sciences, dies at age 93.
lead_paragraph: Dr. Buchanan, a professor emeritus at George Mason University and a conservative thinker on taxes and size of government, won the 1986 Nobel in economic sciences.

headline.seo: James M. Buchanan, Economic Scholar, Dies at 93
headline.main: James M. Buchanan, Economic Scholar and Nobel Laureate, Dies at 93
headline.print_headline: James M. Buchanan, Economic Scholar and Nobel Laureate, Dies at 93
